member.name: T:SuffixArray.SAIS
member.summary: An implementation of the induced sorting based suffix array construction algorithm.

member.name: M:SuffixArray.SAIS.sufsort(System.Byte[],System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the suffix array of a given string in linear time.
member.returns: 0 if no error occurred, -1 or -2 otherwise

member.name: M:SuffixArray.SAIS.sufsort(System.Char[],System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the suffix array of a given string in linear time.
member.returns: 0 if no error occurred, -1 or -2 otherwise

member.name: M:SuffixArray.SAIS.sufsort(System.Int32[],System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the suffix array of a given string in linear time.
member.returns: 0 if no error occurred, -1 or -2 otherwise

member.name: M:SuffixArray.SAIS.sufsort(System.String,System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the suffix array of a given string in linear time.
member.returns: 0 if no error occurred, -1 or -2 otherwise

member.name: M:SuffixArray.SAIS.bwt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the burrows-wheeler transformed string of a given string in linear time.
member.returns: primary index if no error occurred, -1 or -2 otherwise

member.name: M:SuffixArray.SAIS.bwt(System.Char[],System.Char[],System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the burrows-wheeler transformed string of a given string in linear time.
member.returns: primary index if no error occurred, -1 or -2 otherwise

member.name: M:SuffixArray.SAIS.bwt(System.Int32[],System.Int32[],System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the burrows-wheeler transformed string of a given string in linear time.
member.returns: primary index if no error occurred, -1 or -2 otherwise
